venue.address_1: corner of Benefit and College Streets
venue.name: Ghost Tour start point

item.description:
The Providence Ghost Walk is Providenceâ€™s original, longest-running ghosts and graveyards tour! Join Rory Raven for a stroll through the haunted history of Providence, Rhode Island, one of the nation's oldest and most haunted cities.

Rory has spent years collecting local ghost stories and relates these strange tales on the Ghost Walk, often in the shadow of the very site where the hauntings are said to occur.

The Providence Ghost Walk leaves from in front of the Providence Athenaeum (at the corner of Benefit and College Streets) at 3pm.

Tickets are $8.00 (Have it available in cash for Rory at the meeting point)

NOTE: Please RSVP "yes" only if you are certain that you will be attending, so that I can give Ghost Tours an accurate head count, and they know what to expect.
item.name: Ghost Tour with Rory Raven
